Text:
Pitch-black ocean as far as the eye can see. The only
lights are from the stars and the moon...

(This is actually a pretty ideal situation. We got
really lucky, getting stranded on a deserted island.
Wonder what I should do tomorrow.)

(I could set some traps to gather food... Spear
fishing is a must, too.)
Heheheh... Things are getting exciting!
There you are.
Alpha. You're still up?

I'd ask you the same question. Mind if I sit next
to you?
Of course not.

You know...this kind of reminds me of the old days.
When the Shadow Garden had just started, and it was
only the two of us.
True... It was like this in the beginning.

(Before I knew it, more and more people were
joining, and suddenly the facilities were getting
better and better...)

We built everything from scratch back then as well.
We can handle this. We'll make this place livable in
no time.

Even this lonely island will be lively if we call
everyone hereâ€”
...I kinda like it the way it is now.
Huh...?

(Does that mean...he prefers for it to be just the
two of us...? Why would he...?)

(His profile looks a little tired and melancholy...
Ah, I see...)

(Shadow, you're carrying such a heavy burden...
Moments when you can be yourself are rare. It's only
natural you would seek some brief respite.)

I may not shoulder as much as you do...but I think I
understand how you feel a little.
You too, Alpha...? I see. I'm glad to hear that.

(Wait, does that mean Alpha also wanted to try
surviving on a deserted island?!)

(I get it, I totally get it...! It's thrilling,
isn't it? Living on the edge, trying to survive in
the untamed wilderness!)

But we can't remain like this forever. I'm the
leader of Shadow Garden, after all.

(Alpha... Does she feel guilty about us having this
island to ourselves...? But I can't give up now...!)

Alpha, you're doing a great job. But out here in the
wild, I guess titles don't really matter.
*gasp*

(That's right! What we need now is the ruthlessness
to outsmart our comrades...! Survival on a deserted
island is merciless...!)

To hear you say that... Yes, right now, we're just a
man and a woman, nothing more...

(Hm? Alpha? She's blushing bright red...and her eyes
are all glazed over... Huh?)
In that case...
What're you two doing?

N-Nothing. We were just talking a little about the
future.

In that case, let me join in. If you have an escape
plan, I'd like to hear it.

It's nothing that concrete. Just how we'll spend our
time starting tomorrow...right?
Hm? Well, something like that...I guess?

Zeta, let's head back. Staying up too late will
negatively affect us tomorrow.

What about Master Shadow? If he's not coming back,
I'll stay and guard himâ€”

No, we mustn't bother Cid any further. Let's go,
Zeta.
...Fine. Good night, Master Shadow.

Good night, Cid. Your words meant a lot to me. Have
a good night.

I don't really get it, but... I guess Alpha is also
super excited about surviving on a deserted
island...?
